pkgmetadata.longdescription: # davteutilThis project provides convenient general-purpose functions, used by [Davte](t.me/davte) in his projects.Please note that you need Python3.5+ to run async code## Project folders## Usage```import asynciofrom davteutil.utilities import async_get, async_postasync def main(): url = 'http://www.google.com' result = await async_get(url, mode='html') print(result)loop = asyncio.get_event_loop()loop.run_until_complete(main())```
